job.command:
starver SL13c
setenv EMBEDTAGDIR /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/embedDir/
setenv EMYEAR `perl StRoot/macros/embedding/getYearDayFromFile.pl -y ${FILEBASENAME}` setenv EMDAY `perl StRoot/macros/embedding/getYearDayFromFile.pl -d ${FILEBASENAME}`
setenv EMLOGS /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/embedLogs/
setenv EMOUTPUT /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/KFV/firstPass/Jpsi2ee_STARlight_&FSET;_KFV/P10ik.SL10k_embed/$EMYEAR/$EMDAY setenv EMLIST /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/KFV/firstPass/Jpsi2ee_STARlight_KFV/FSET&FSET;_P10ik.SL10k_embed_$EMYEAR
echo EMYEAR : $EMYEAR echo EMDAY : $EMDAY echo EMLOGS : $EMLOGS echo EMOUTPUT : $EMOUTPUT echo EMLIST : $EMLIST
set daqevents=/star/u/desilva/WorkKFvertex/2010_Jpsi2ee_embedding/Input/daq_AuAu200_SL10k_zerobias_nevents.list set kumac=/star/u/desilva/WorkKFvertex/2010_Jpsi2ee_embedding/Input/starlight_Jpsi_ee.kumac set fzdFile=${FILEBASENAME}.fzd set random=`/star/u/desilva/WorkKFvertex/2010_Jpsi2ee_embedding/Input/get_random_seed` set seed=`echo $random | awk '{print $1}'` set ptmin=0 set ptmax=30 set nevents=`grep $FILEBASENAME $daqevents | awk '{print $2}'` echo nevents = $nevents, random = $random, kumac = $kumac, fzdFile=$fzdFile, ptmin = $ptmin, ptmax = $ptmax set vertex=vertex.txt set data=/star/u/desilva/WorkKFvertex/2010_Jpsi2ee_embedding/Input/UPCAuAu200_Jpsi_04242015_zDistributions.root root4star -b -q /star/u/desilva/WorkKFvertex/2010_Jpsi2ee_embedding/Input/GenerateVertex.C\($nevents,$seed,\"@$FILELIST\",\"$vertex\",\"Jet\",\"$data\"\) starsim -w 0 -b $kumac $vertex $fzdFile $random $nevents $ptmin $ptmax
echo 'Executing bfcMixer_UPCAuAu200_P10ik(1000, "$INPUTFILE0", "$EMBEDTAGDIR/${FILEBASENAME}.tags.root", 0, 30, -1.5, 1.5, -200, 200, 100, 8, 1, 0, "P10ikAuAu200", "FlatPt", 1, "${FILEBASENAME}.fzd"); ...'
root4star -b <<EOF .L StRoot/macros/embedding/bfcMixer_UPCAuAu200_P10ik.C bfcMixer_UPCAuAu200_P10ik(1000, "$INPUTFILE0", "$EMBEDTAGDIR/${FILEBASENAME}.tags.root", 0, 30, -1.5, 1.5, -200, 200, 100, 8, 1, 0, "P10ikAuAu200", "FlatPt", 1, "${FILEBASENAME}.fzd"); .q EOF ls -la .
if ( ! -f $EMOUTPUT ) then umask 2 mkdir -pv $EMOUTPUT chmod -R ug+rw $EMOUTPUT endif if ( ! -f $EMLIST ) then umask 2 mkdir -pv $EMLIST chmod -R ug+rw $EMLIST endif
mv -v $EMLOGS/P10ik/LOG/$JOBID.log $EMOUTPUT/${FILEBASENAME}.$JOBID.log mv -v $EMLOGS/P10ik/LOG/$JOBID.elog $EMOUTPUT/${FILEBASENAME}.$JOBID.elog gzip -f $EMOUTPUT/${FILEBASENAME}.$JOBID.log gzip -f $EMOUTPUT/${FILEBASENAME}.$JOBID.elog mv -v /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/embedLogs/P10ik/Jpsi_ee_STARlight_20142801/LIST/sched$JOBID.csh $EMLIST/ rm -v /star/data20/embedding/reco/2010_zerobias/kfVertexStudies/embedLogs/P10ik/Jpsi_ee_STARlight_20142801/LIST/sched$JOBID.list
